Reviews.Title: late delivery
Reviews.Author: L. D. Buehler
Reviews.Content: The T.V. itself is great.I found it in a retail store and was able to compare the picture and features to Sony,Samsung etc. And it was the BEST.The delivery was not what I expected. They gave me a four day window then moved it back another week which caused me inconvenience since I was in town for the original dates but out of state for the second. Had I known they were going to change the dates I would have found another vender.The price was ver good, however. I saved $700.00 by not going the retail route.It all worked out and I am happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Vertical Lines ruin a great picture
Reviews.Author: Christopher R. Balcer "Chris B"
Reviews.Content: TV worked great for about three months, then a vertical line appeared on the right side of the screen.  A few weeks later, a vertical line appeared on the left side of the screen.  We will now have to work with Mitsubishi's customer service to determine what the problem is and how they will fix it.Overall, the picture is great after the line disappears (usually 30 min after turning it on).

Reviews.Title: Flawed after one year
Reviews.Author: Russ Widstrand
Reviews.Content: After one year this tv developed 3 lines at the right side of the screen. Blacks are weak in dark room.
